metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46456 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NASM v2.16 was discovered to contain a global buffer overflow in the component dbgdbg_typevalue at /output/outdbg.c.

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: nasm package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qt6-webengine package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
